text: Goalposts move. Financial advice changes game entirely!
For real though! On paper might look solid – job stable n' stuff – but off script? It's just jazz improv every day.
Profit unlikely; emus aren’t exactly crypto!
Networking’s fine but pushing policy changes at work has been key – gotta shift mindsets systematically if we’re serious about equality.
Gender bias exists everywhere - even impacts funding for health programs.
